protocol.name: P-G10643-1
protocol.text: dor  plants were grown under normal watering conditions for 24 days and then stressed by completely depriving of irrigation for 10 days. Arabidopsis rosette leaves samples were homogenized in liquid nitrogen prior to RNA isolation Arabidopsis plants were grown in soil under long-day conditions (16 hr light; 8 hr dark) at 22 degree

protocol.name: P-G10643-2
protocol.text: Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 5 ug total RNA (Expression Analysis Technical Manual, 2001, Affymetrix).

protocol.name: P-G10643-3
protocol.text: total RNA was isolated by RNAplant reagent ((Tiangen Biotech))and  purified by Qiagen RNeasy kit.

protocol.name: P-G10643-4
protocol.text: dor plants were grown under normal watering conditions for 34 days. Arabidopsis rosette leaves samples were homogenized in liquid nitrogen prior to RNA isolation Arabidopsis plants were grown   in soil under long-day conditions (16 hr light; 8 hr dark) at 22 degree

Arabidopsis rosette leaves samples were homogenized in liquid nitrogen prior to RNA isolation Arabidopsis plants were grown in soil under long-day conditions (16 hr light; 8 hr dark) at 22 degree

protocol.name: P-G10643-6
protocol.text: total RNA was isolated and  purified by Qiagen RNeasy kit
